ygData.subject: RE: New Lullaby theory
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmmm maybe I had a streak of very good luck last night.  I was in the penthouse in the Aviak city and I had rooks nodding off left and right when we got in
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:07 AM 02/23/2000 , you wrote:
>
> From: Peck White <pwhite@...>
>
> I regretfully tell you that I was a couple of levels below level 15 when the
> patch that nerfed Lullaby went in, so I've never seen what it could do
> pre-nerf. My experience with lullaby even at level 15 was that "it's a
> great taunt song". I've never been able to reliably crowd control to this
> date. I guess when I get charm in four more levels I'll be able to control
> a crowd of three, but if pixie strike is as bugged as Lullaby I guess that
> will be the best I will ever do.
>
> Tomerrilin


Hmmm maybe I had a streak of very good luck last night. I was in the penthouse
in the Aviak city and I had rooks nodding off left and right when we got in
trouble. I was the lowest level up there at 18 and was not using any
instruments. The sleeping rooks would occasionally wake up swing at me then
nod back off. I just had to be sure I told the others to leave them alone and
let them sleep. The rooks were red to me. At one time we had a Harrier that
we were attacking and 2 sleeping rooks. Sure sounds to me like it is working
properly.

Katawn 18th Season Wood Elf Bard
Mithaniel Marr Server

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
